thread.title: Gas leak causes Hudson Schools' move to Cedar Falls church
thread.title_full: Gas leak causes Hudson Schools' move to Cedar Falls church

author: COURIER STAFF
title: Gas leak causes Hudson Schools' move to Cedar Falls church
text:
HUDSON — Hudson Community Schools' students have been relocated to a Cedar Falls church following a natural gas release on Wednesday.
Omaha World-Herald, 2301 N 117th Ave., Suite 201 Omaha, NE 68164
HUDSON — Hudson Community Schools' students have been relocated to a Cedar Falls church following a natural gas release on Wednesday.
First-year Hudson coach Zac Ceresa and Grundy Center volleyball coach Lori Willis talk about Tuesday's match.
